description:
Suit up for Canadian summer. Made of super stretchy neoprene, this back-entry wetsuit won't restrict your moves when you're catching a wave.

  • Eco Limestone Veoprene with flatlock seam construction
  • 3mm thick neoprene on the torso and legs
  • 2mm thick neoprene arms
  • Duraflex knee panels
  • Water-tight back zipper entry
  • Recommended water temperature: 13-18°C
name: Xcel Axis Flatlock 3/2mm Long Sleeve Back Zip Full-body Wetsuit - Women's
